snippet: In Portland, Ore., the largest American city not fluoridating its water, a decision involves questions of personal choice and societal burden.
abstract: Portland, Ore, the largest American city not fluoridating its water, will hold a City Council vote on the issue; heated debate over decision has brought up questions of personal choice and societal burden.
lead_paragraph: In Portland, Ore., the largest American city not fluoridating its water, a decision involves questions of personal choice and societal burden.

headline.seo: Portland Weighs Fluoride Years After Broad Acceptance
headline.main: Doubts as Portland Weighs Fluoride and Its Civic Values
headline.print_headline: Doubts as Portland Weighs Fluoride and Its Civic Values
